english:
Thank you for playing.
This update (ver 1.0.1) addresses several issues to improve stability and presentation.

Fixed an issue where area expansion was not functioning properly.

Fixed a bug that caused the UI to appear in screenshots.

Corrected various localization errors.

We appreciate your continued support and hope you enjoy your time on the rooftop.

Fixed an issue where area expansion did not execute correctly.
Resolved a problem where the UI appeared in screenshots.
